title: Berbere (Ethiopian spice mix)
ingredients: ['125g chilli powder', '55g paprika', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground fenugreek', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 teaspoon onion granules', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cardamom', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
